channel.title: Chronicscape718
channel.description:
Hey all I have another server out after the fall of Fantasyscape. It will now be called Chronicscape (As was the name of my old servers I just thought to bring it back). I will be bringing the best to you again and more content this time! I have been working on fixing things and adding more stuff. I will also take suggestions from players as well as the server goes on. I self host still and will be 24/7 so dont frown lol it will be on! Below I will list some features this server has and keep in mind there is a LOT more than whats on this list. Lots of which are unique.
Links for the site and the webclient below (yes ik its webs but oh well who cares? i want ppl to pl ay on the server not be forum junkies).
[URL=http://chronicscape718.webs.com/]~Website~[/URL]
[URL=http://chronicscape718.webs.com/webclient]~Webclient~[/URL]
[URL=https://mega.co.nz/#!ZMIFTAIa!bpLipX0jk4LapFHJ0eSQHCHVzjQSOx4k-jUv2utZRxo]~Client~[/URL]
Features: -Jad -Kiln -Custom Dung -All skills trainable -Thieving guild -Fight pits -Duel arena -Clan wars -Castle wars -Polypore -Jadinko -Crucible -Dominion Tower -Fun commands (Such as ::fly and many more) -Dragon Slayer Quest -Custom AFK Zone -Big Donator Island -Kalphite Queen -Bork -Custom Nomad Zone (multiplayer) -Eyeball Minigame (Small to giant Eyeball NPCs attacking you in waves) -Thessalia/Hairdresser -EOC Hair commands -Cool Custom Weapons -Godwars With Godwar Boss Points And Shop -4 Different Agility Courses -Barrows (Added exits from the crypts so no need to teleport out) -Queen Black Dragon With Rewards Room -Corporeal Beast And Glacors Now Have RS Drops And Rate -King Black Dragon -Tormented Demons -Custom Teleport GFX/Anims -SOF -Special Pets -Clan Avatar Pet (Working healing option for Orts) -PK Events/Rewards -Great/Active Staff -Fun PVP/PVE Areas
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bAymDej.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bAbUcGT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AyJDDWJ.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Mavjjin.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mgii54M.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/W4nlYBS.jpg[/img]

item.title: Chronicscape718
item.dc:creator: @mogging mogging
item.description:
@mogging wrote:

Hey all I have another server out after the fall of Fantasyscape. It will now be called Chronicscape (As was the name of my old servers I just thought to bring it back). I will be bringing the best to you again and more content this time! I have been working on fixing things and adding more stuff. I will also take suggestions from players as well as the server goes on. I self host still and will be 24/7 so dont frown lol it will be on! Below I will list some features this server has and keep in mind there is a LOT more than whats on this list. Lots of which are unique.

Links for the site and the webclient below (yes ik its webs but oh well who cares? i want ppl to pl ay on the server not be forum junkies).

[URL=http://chronicscape718.webs.com/]~Website~[/URL]

[URL=http://chronicscape718.webs.com/webclient]~Webclient~[/URL]

[URL=https://mega.co.nz/#!ZMIFTAIa!bpLipX0jk4LapFHJ0eSQHCHVzjQSOx4k-jUv2utZRxo]~Client~[/URL]

Features:
-Jad
-Kiln
-Custom Dung
-All skills trainable
-Thieving guild
-Fight pits
-Duel arena
-Clan wars
-Castle wars
-Polypore
-Jadinko
-Crucible
-Dominion Tower
-Fun commands (Such as ::fly and many more)
-Dragon Slayer Quest
-Custom AFK Zone
-Big Donator Island
-Kalphite Queen
-Bork
-Custom Nomad Zone (multiplayer)
-Eyeball Minigame (Small to giant Eyeball NPCs attacking you in waves)
-Thessalia/Hairdresser
-EOC Hair commands
-Cool Custom Weapons
-Godwars With Godwar Boss Points And Shop
-4 Different Agility Courses
-Barrows (Added exits from the crypts so no need to teleport out)
-Queen Black Dragon With Rewards Room
-Corporeal Beast And Glacors Now Have RS Drops And Rate
-King Black Dragon
-Tormented Demons
-Custom Teleport GFX/Anims
-SOF
-Special Pets
-Clan Avatar Pet (Working healing option for Orts)
-PK Events/Rewards
-Great/Active Staff
-Fun PVP/PVE Areas
